Call, email or submit an inquiry today to learn more! 54 North Market Street, Charleston, SC 29401 Visit us at map marker pin Every Day 11:00 AM - 2:00 AM (843)-723-4363 Call us at - Restaurant Bar & Music Hall Henry’s is centrally located in historic downtown Charleston at 54 North Market Street, across from the Charleston city market. Established in 1932, Henry’s is the oldest continuous restaurant in Charleston and the state of South Carolina. Read more about us Groups & parties Tailored events for all occasions Create memories to last a lifetime with our personalized private party options. Let our team help you plan an unforgettable celebration. Skip Photo Gallery The interior with upholstered seats and tables Served Shrimp Grits Mary's Greek Salad and other dishes A served Spicy Shrimp Roll A plate of Jambalaya Served Mary's Greek Salad A served Charcuterie plate Bourbon Bread Pudding Two meals and a drink Market Burger Southern Shrimp Tacos The outdoor patio A closeup on a Seafood Pasta plate The interior of the restaurant with tables, chairs, and decorations Reviews Start stop reviews carousel Review by - Google Rebecca L: five star review by Oldest restaurant in CHS; Live music nightly; outstanding service, great atmosphere, and delicious food; try the She soup, best chicken salad sandwich I have ever ate Review by - Google Aldo P: five star review by Comfortable atmosphere. The old fashion is excellent made with Ben&Steal local whiskey. Roof top Bar keeps it more of a quiet experience. Review by - Google Les H: five star review by Great place to stop in for a bite to eat. Service and food was excellent, and being the oldest running restaurant it's a cool piece of history. Would definitely come back next time in town. Review by - Google Philip C: five star review by What a great venue multiple levels of bars music restaurants great drinks great service beautiful vibe Great atmosphere. Review by - Google Susan D: five star review by Recently did a girls trip to Charleston and discovered this place. We loved it so much we went 3 times! Delicious jambalaya and the rum punch is amazing! Newsletter Location 54 North Market Street Charleston, SC 29401 Hours Every day 11:00 AM - 2:00 AM Thursday/Friday/Saturday 23+ after 8:30pm Cover charge may begin at variable times depending on nightly activity and capacity. Please check with our staff upon arrival for the most up-to-date information. Find us on...
